definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Seen under a microscope , a fresh snowflake has a delicate six-pointed shape.
sentences.chinese: 在顯微鏡下觀察，剛飄下的雪花呈精巧的六角形。

sentences.english: France is known by Frenchmen as "the Hexagon" because of its shape.
sentences.chinese: 由於其版圖形狀，法國人稱法國是六角形。

sentences.english: The metal wire diameter is different according to the size of the hexagon.
sentences.chinese: 使用的金屬線徑是根據六角形的大小而不同。

sentences.english: But the most notable difference is that the hexagonal outline around the icons is now gone.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最顯著的區別是，六角形的圖標現在不見了。

sentences.english: The upper stem is threaded into the diaphragm retainer nut.
sentences.chinese: 手輪下面是一個六角形外螺紋橫膈膜止動螺母。

sentences.english: Beneath the handwheel is a hexheaded externally-threaded diaphragm-retaining nut.
sentences.chinese: 手輪下面是一個六角形外螺紋橫膈膜止動螺母。

sentences.english: Stainless Steel, Stud Type, Hex-Drive Socket.
sentences.chinese: 不鏽鋼螺栓，螺柱型，六角形驅動套節。

sentences.english: Solder the ring to the hexagon with IT solder.
sentences.chinese: 使用砝琅高焊焊接戒指與六角形戒面。

definition: six-sided figure (such as a cube or parallelepiped)
